mapper.select: select mail_provider_base.provider_name,mail_channel_mapper.channel_id,mail_channel_mapper.channel_weight,mail_channel_mapper.template_id from mail_channel_mapper INNER JOIN mail_channel_base ON mail_channel_mapper.channel_id = mail_channel_base.channel_id INNER JOIN mail_provider_base ON mail_provider_base.provider_id = mail_channel_mapper.provider_id and mail_provider_base.provider_status = 0 and mail_channel_mapper.channel_weight <> 0 and mail_channel_base.channel_id = #{channel_id}
